info.name: Sufism Vendor APIs - Shipping, Payout & Onboarding
info.description: Complete API collection for vendor shipping rates, payout methods, and onboarding flow

item.name: Vendor Shipping APIs
item.description: APIs for vendor shipping configuration and rate management

response.name: Validation Success

item.name: Vendor Payout APIs
item.description: APIs for vendor payout configuration and management

request.description: Create or update vendor payout configuration

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "status": 200,
  "message": "Payout configuration updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": "payout_config_123",
    "vendorId": "vendor_123",
    "payoutMethod": "BANK_TRANSFER",
    "frequency": "WEEKLY",
    "isActive": true,
    "isVerified": false,
    "createdAt": "2025-01-25T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2025-01-25T10:00:00Z"
  }
}

response.name: Success Response
Success Response

request.description: Get list of available payout methods

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "status": 200,
  "message": "Available payout methods retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "methods": [
      {
        "id": "BANK_TRANSFER",
        "name": "Bank Transfer",
        "description": "Direct deposit to your bank account",
        "processingTime": "1-3 business days",
        "fees": "Free",
        "isAvailable": true,
        "requirements": [
          "Valid bank account",
          "Routing number",
          "Account holder verification"
        ]
      },
      {
        "id": "PAYPAL",
        "name": "PayPal",
        "description": "Transfer to PayPal account",
        "processingTime": "Instant",
        "fees": "2.9% + $0.30",
        "isAvailable": true,
        "requirements": [
          "PayPal Business account",
          "Email verification",
          "Bank account linked"
        ]
      },
      {
        "id": "STRIPE_CONNECT",
        "name": "Stripe Connect",
        "description": "Direct to Stripe account",
        "processingTime": "2-7 business days",
        "fees": "2.9% + $0.30",
        "isAvailable": true,
        "requirements": [
          "Stripe account",
          "Tax information",
          "Identity verification"
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}

request.description: Get vendor onboarding status including payout and shipping setup

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "status": 200,
  "message": "Onboarding status retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "vendorId": "vendor_123",
    "isCompleted": false,
    "payoutConfigCompleted": true,
    "shippingConfigCompleted": false,
    "vendorAccepted": true,
    "steps": [
      {
        "id": "payout_setup",
        "name": "Payout Configuration",
        "description": "Set up your payment method for receiving payouts",
        "isCompleted": true,
        "isRequired": true,
        "completedAt": "2025-01-25T10:00:00Z"
      },
      {
        "id": "shipping_setup",
        "name": "Shipping Configuration",
        "description": "Configure your shipping rates and zones",
        "isCompleted": false,
        "isRequired": true,
        "completedAt": null
      },
      {
        "id": "profile_completion",
        "name": "Profile Completion",
        "description": "Complete your vendor profile information",
        "isCompleted": true,
        "isRequired": false,
        "completedAt": "2025-01-24T15:30:00Z"
      }
    ],
    "nextSteps": [
      "Complete shipping configuration",
      "Add product catalog",
      "Set up inventory management"
    ],
    "canStartSelling": false,
    "estimatedCompletionTime": "30 minutes"
  }
}

request.description: Verify payout configuration for a specific vendor

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "status": 200,
  "message": "Payout configuration verification completed",
  "data": {
    "vendorId": "vendor_123",
    "isVerified": true,
    "verificationStatus": "APPROVED",
    "verificationDate": "2025-01-25T10:30:00Z",
    "verificationNotes": "All payout details verified successfully",
    "nextPayoutDate": "2025-02-01T00:00:00Z",
    "estimatedPayoutAmount": 1250.75
  }
}

item.name: Vendor Onboarding APIs
item.description: APIs for vendor onboarding flow and status management

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "status": 200,
  "message": "Onboarding status retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "vendorId": "vendor_123",
    "overallProgress": 75,
    "isCompleted": false,
    "canStartSelling": false,
    "steps": [
      {
        "id": "account_setup",
        "name": "Account Setup",
        "description": "Create vendor account and basic information",
        "isCompleted": true,
        "isRequired": true,
        "completedAt": "2025-01-24T10:00:00Z"
      },
      {
        "id": "payout_setup",
        "name": "Payout Configuration",
        "description": "Set up payment method for receiving payouts",
        "isCompleted": true,
        "isRequired": true,
        "completedAt": "2025-01-25T10:00:00Z"
      },
      {
        "id": "shipping_setup",
        "name": "Shipping Configuration",
        "description": "Configure shipping rates and zones",
        "isCompleted": false,
        "isRequired": true,
        "completedAt": null
      },
      {
        "id": "product_catalog",
        "name": "Product Catalog",
        "description": "Add products to your catalog",
        "isCompleted": false,
        "isRequired": true,
        "completedAt": null
      }
    ],
    "nextSteps": [
      "Complete shipping configuration",
      "Add your first product",
      "Set up inventory tracking"
    ],
    "estimatedCompletionTime": "45 minutes",
    "helpResources": [
      "Shipping setup guide",
      "Product catalog tutorial",
      "Inventory management help"
    ]
  }
}
